name: Seasonal Crush 2.0
description:
This is my game "Seasonal Crush".

This is the Levels Locked Version which allows you to play the game normally and advance if the goals have been met.

The 'X' on each level in the bottom left corner is a pause button which stops you making moves when pressed and allows you to make moves when pressed again

CAN'T PLAY IN FULLSCREEN, GAMES STARTS TO LAG!
